Class Worker

java.lang.Object
  system.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Represents a worker thread executing in every Worker Manager

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam
